subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets were frustrated by their own ineptitude against the Grizzlies and incensed over the officiating, specifically the lack of a foul call after Deron Williams was hammered with 26 seconds to go and the game tied.
snippet: The Nets were frustrated by their own ineptitude against the Grizzlies and incensed over the officiating, specifically the lack of a foul call after Deron Williams was hammered with 26 seconds to go and the game tied.
